css.text: background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1); background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0, %0), color-stop(1, %1)); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr="%0", endColorstr="%1", GradientType="0");

color: #ffffff; background-color: %1; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1); background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0, %0), color-stop(1, %1)); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr="%0", endColorstr="%1", GradientType="0"); display:block;width:100%;height:100%;

background: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#FFE655), to(#FF9900)); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #FFE655, #FF9900 undefined); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #FFE655, #FF9900); filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr=#FFE655, endColorstr=#FF9900, grandientType=1); color: #000;

background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1); background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0, %0), color-stop(1, %1)); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr="%0", endColorstr="%1", GradientType="0");

background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0, %0), color-stop(1, %1)); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr="%0", endColorstr="%1", GradientType="0");

background: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 120%, from(%0), to(%1)); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1 120%); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, %0, %1); filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr=%0, endColorstr=%1, grandientType=1);color: #FFF;

background: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#FEDC56), to(#FBB42F)); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #FEDC56, #FBB42F); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #FEDC56, #FBB42F); filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr=#FEDC56, endColorstr=#FBB42F, grandientType=1);color: #000; border-color: #CF8905;
